node.title: Bodies of three people with gunshot wounds found
node.alt: A Garda vehicle at the scene of the shootings in County Kerry
node.description: Garda√≠ (Irish police) say the bodies were discovered at property in north County Kerry.
node.content:
["", "
A Garda vehicle at the scene of the shootings in County Kerry
", "Garda\u00ed (Irish police) have launched a criminal investigation after three people were found dead with gunshot wounds at a house in County Kerry.", "A woman, 56, and a man, 24, were found inside the property at Ballyreahan, near Lixnaw, on Tuesday.", "A 63-year-old man was found at the boundary of the rear yard. All three were from the same family, according to Irish broadcaster RT\u00c9.", "Garda\u00ed said a firearm was recovered near to the body of the older man.", "They said they are not looking for anyone else in connection with the incident.", "The scene was preserved overnight on Tuesday, and the Garda Technical Bureau has started a forensic examination. ", "The locum assistant state pathologist also attended the scene. ", "Garda\u00ed confirmed they had attended the house, which is situated between the towns of Listowel and Tralee, at about 20:30 local time on Tuesday after receiving a call from a concerned member of the public.", "The bodies of all three were taken to University Hospital Kerry, Tralee where post mortem examinations will take place.", "A family liaison officer has been appointed to the extended families of the deceased, and garda\u00ed have appealed for privacy.", "
'Community shell-shocked'
", "Mike Kennelly, a Fine Gael councillor in Listowel, described it as a \"very sad incident\".", "He had been speaking to people from the area where the shooting took place and said they were going through a \"terrible time\".", "\"The whole community is completely shell-shocked waking up to this news,\" he told BBC News NI.", "Mr Kennelly added that the incident had been completely unexpected but said that it would not be appropriate to comment further until all investigations had been completed."]
